quotes.quote: I don’t want to be without you. I want to be with you until the end of time.
Don't worry, I'll protect you no matter what.
The moment I realized my existence was too great to bear, it became my curse.
If you think I’m beautiful, then I am.
I don’t believe in destiny. I believe in hard work.
Time will always flow. Everything will pass by. That might be why youth is beautiful. It shines, blindingly bright, for just an instant. But you can never go back to it.
I don’t need revenge. I just want to become someone who can move forward without being afraid.
Every day can’t be a tragedy just because you lose every day. It’s easy to forget after you laugh. You have to forget in order to move on.
Every day can’t be a tragedy just because you lose every day. It’s easy to forget after you laugh. You have to forget in order to move on.
Every day can’t be a tragedy just because you lose every day. It’s easy to forget after you laugh. You have to forget in order to move on.
